HasPlugin{PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-a", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-a.tar.gz"}} -> {false}
HasPlugin{PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-a", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-a.tar.gz"}} -> {false}
DownloadPlugin{ctx, PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-a", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-a.tar.gz"}} -> {"$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0", <func(bool)>, nil}
LoadPluginProjectAt{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0"} -> {PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0/PulumiPlugin.yaml", nil}
InstallPluginAt{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0", PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}} -> {nil}
DownloadPlugin.MarkInstallationDone{PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-a", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:1}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-a.tar.gz"}, true} -> {}
GetRequiredPackages{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0", PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}} -> {[1]{PackageDescriptor{PluginDescriptor:PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-b", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:2}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-b.tar.gz"}}}, nil}
HasPlugin{PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-b", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:2}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-b.tar.gz"}} -> {false}
DownloadPlugin{ctx, PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-b", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:2}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-b.tar.gz"}} -> {"$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-b-v2.0.0", <func(bool)>, nil}
LoadPluginProjectAt{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-b-v2.0.0"} -> {PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-b-v2.0.0/PulumiPlugin.yaml", nil}
InstallPluginAt{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-b-v2.0.0", PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}} -> {nil}
DownloadPlugin.MarkInstallationDone{PluginDescriptor{Name:"plugin-b", Kind:"resource", Version:Version{Major:2}, PluginDownloadURL:"https://example.com/plugin-b.tar.gz"}, true} -> {}
GetRequiredPackages{ctx, "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-b-v2.0.0", PluginProject{Runtime:ProjectRuntimeInfo{name:"go"}}} -> {nil, nil}
RunPackage{ctx, "/tmp", "$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0", "plugin-a", nil} -> {invariantProvider{path:"$HOME/.pulumi/plugins/resource-plugin-a-v1.0.0"}, nil}
